defs: = ಒತ್ತೆವೆಣ್.
= ಒತ್ತೆವಿಡಿ.
to increase; to become more.
to be heaped or piled up; to be gathered at a place.
a small vermicelli making metal or wooden mortar having (usu. replaceable) plates with holes at the bottom, a piston to press the dough or batter and get thin strings.
excessive joy.
a single arm.
the distance of the arm taken as a unit of linear measure.
the vowel 'ಒ'; its sound and the sign used to donate it when compounded with a consonant.
ಒತ್ವದ ದೀರ್ಘ otvada dirgha (rightly ಓತ್ವ) the vowel 'ಓ'; 2. its sound and the sign used to denote it when compounded with a consonant.
the fact of getting, receiving.
the act of supplying; supply.
the fact of being sufficient or more than usual.
something given to show friendship, affection, support, etc.; a present; a gift.
to make available; to supply; to provide with.
to make ready; to prepare.
to cause to happen.
to overspread with something unctuous, viscous or adhesive; to smear; to daub.
to occur by chance; to come into being or occur as an event, process or result.
to be got, found or met with.
to give assistance or support to; to help.
to pursue with intent to capture; to chase.
to go to a side (as to give way to another coming from behind).
to meet or satisfy a demand; to be sufficient; to suffice.
to come in; to enter; to go close to.
to go forward; to move ahead.
to be possible.
ಒದಗಿದವ odagidava he who has helped, supported, assisted or constructively co-operated; ಒದಗಿಬರು odagi baru to occur by chance, as by grace of Providence, mere luck, etc.
that which is got, received, befallen.
the help supplied; assistance; aid.
capability - a) the quality or state of being capable; b) the facility or potential for an indicated use or deployment.
eagerness and ardent interest in pursuit of something; zeal; enthusiasm.

a preparation of fenugreek (the seeds of Trigonella foenum-graceu), black gram (pulse of Phaseolus mungo) etc., in which several unicellula ascomycetous fungi are developed, used as a fermenting agent or to raise dough of dōse, idli etc.; a kind of kitchen-yeast.
the quality of being proper, appropriate etc.; properness.
practical knowledge or skill derived from direct observation, participation.
the intensity of power; impetus; force.
a number of individuals assembled together or having some unifying relationship.
the quality or state of being neat orderly; neatness; tidiness.
a sufficient or great supply; availability of a thing in more than the usual or required quantity.
ಒದಗಿನ ಪುಡಿ odagina puḍi a mixture of baking soda and starch (or flour) and any acid forming substance, used as a leavening agent in making baked goods (to raise dough).
a conduit, pipe through which something is supplied.
a pipe - a) a long tube of clay, concrete, metal, plastic, etc. for conveying water, gas, oil etc.; b) a tubular organ of the body.
the firm flesh surrounding the alveolar parts of the jaws on the inside of the mouth and surrounding the base of the teeth; the alveolar portion of a jaw with its enveloping soft tissues; the gum.
a moving or vibrating rapidly; rapid rhythmic movement back and forth; vibration.
the act of shaking something (as a cloth, bag, etc. as to get rid of dust).
a shouting or calling out noisily; the sound or noise so made; bawling; raving.
to move or vibrate rapidly.
to quiver, shiver from or as from cold, fever, etc.
to be unquiet or restless or mentally disturbed.
to shout or call out noisily; to bawl; to talk with uncontrolled wrath; to rave.
to slap one's shoulders or hands.
to shake something (as to get rid of dust).
to move or vibrate rapidly to and from or from side to side.
to reproach in scornful or sarcastic language; to blame or scold in a sharp way; to reprimand; ಒದರಿಕೊಳ್ಳು1 odarikoḷḷu to shake oneself to get rid of dust.
to shout - a) to utter a sudden loud cry; b) to utter or emit a full loud prolonged sound c) to make or emit a loud confused sound.
to utter a loud, rumbling sound as in excitement, anger, etc; to roar.
(contemp.) to speak; to talk; to bleat.
to call one to come; ಒದರಿಕೊಳ್ಳು2 odarikoḷḷu to shout aloud; to make shrill cry as from pain, fear, etc.
either of the two fleshy parts which in humans and animals form the upper and lower edges of the mouth-opening; the lip.
= ಒದರುದಲೆ.
the unsteady head (of or as of an old man).
one whose tendency is to - a) talk in a noisy manner, b) to leak out secrets.
the act or an instance of shouting aloud; the sound, call or cry so made.
the act or fact of (several things, habits, traits, etc.) being together.
something given to show friendship, affection, support, etc.; a present; a gift.
the tree Dichrstachys cinerea of Mimosaceae family; ashy babul.
to put bring or bring join (different things) together.
to supply; to provide with.
to cause to happen.
to make ready; to prepare.
to occur by chance; to come into being or occur as an event, process or result.
to be got, found or met with.
to attain full legal age; to turn to be an adult.
to break and turn up (ground as to make a hole, construct a well, channel etc.); to dig.
to make oneself ready; to be prepared.
to succeed in an enterprise or activity; to achieve economic success; to thrive; to prosper.
to come together in to a mass or crowd; to congregate; to assemble.
to possess skill, ability, etc.
to be successful; to be fruitful.
to bring up with care; to rear; to foster; to protect.
the condition of being successful or thriving, esp. economic well-being; prosperity.
a being able; physical or mental power to do; ability; skill; expertness; talent.
the act of assisting or the help given.
the act or an instance of joining or being joined.
the act or an instance of happening; occurrence (as by chance).
= ಒದವಿಸು.
= ಒದವು.
to strike heavily with something; to slap.
to cause to scream or shout aloud.
to cause to undergo or inflict pain, agony.
= ಒದರು1.
ಒದಱಿಕೊಳ್ಳು odaṛikoḷḷu = ಒದರಿಕೊಳ್ಳು1 (see under ಒದರು1 ).
= ಒದರು2; ಒದಱಿಕೊಳ್ಳು o da ṛ ikoḷḷu = ಒದರಿಕೊಳ್ಳು2; (ಒದರು2).
to strike out with the foot or feet, as in anger or in swimming, dancing, etc.; to kick.
to make or force (one's way, etc.) by kicking.
to spring up or back.
(a raising sea, river in spate, heavy waves, etc.) to push heavily to a side; to flow over, past or against.
ಒದ್ದುಕೊಳ್ಳು oddukoḷḷu to assist, help with affection or love.
a blow with the foot; a kick.
an instance of kicking.
a rigid side-support; a prop placed against something.
ಒದ್ದುಬಿಡು oddubiḍu (fig.) to refuse to accept (a gift, love, etc.) bluntly.
the habit, tendency or inclination to kick (said usu. of cattle).
a wooden beam used as a support against something.
ಮನೆಗೊಂದು ಮುದಿಕೊರಡು, ಒಲೆಗೊಂದು ಒದೆಕೊರಡು manegondu mudi koraḍu, olegondu mudikoraḍu a old wise person is an asset to the family.
= ಒದೆಕೊರಡು.
a stone pillar bearing the burden from below.
to kick as to fell.
the act of giving a blow with the foot; a kicking; an instance of this.
a heavy blow; a thrashing.
= ಒದೆಕೊರಡು.
to receive kicking or heavy blows.
the act or an instance of kicking mutually.
(fig.) violent exertion; restless activity; struggling; a struggle.
a moving, shaking of limbs in pain, agony, etc.
to kick mutually.
(fig.) to make great efforts or attempts; to strive; to struggle.
(fig.) to make one's way with difficulty.
(fig.) to undergo or suffer unbearable pain.
attachment between friends; friendly feeling or attitude; close association; intimacy.
wetness; dampness; moisture.
a brief fall of rain; shower.
to soak (clothes) in water.
a pad of folded wet cloth tied around or on a swollen or sprained part of the body; a compress; cold, wet blankets or sheets wrapped around a patient's body as a means of treatment; a cold-pack.
a kind of medicinal plant.
to squeeze (a wet cloth) to take out excess water.
a forest.
a garden.
a heavy wooden club used to pound substances in a mortar; a pestle.
a pestle-like heavy weapon.
ಒನಕೆ ಚಿಗುರಿದ ಹಾಗೆ onake cigurida hāge (a sarcastic simile ) (becoming wise is) like a fried seed sprouting or like hatching chickens from fried eggs.
he who uses a pestle or the like as a weapon; (usu. referred to Balarāma, the elder brother of Křṣṇa).
= ಒನಕೆಗಾರ.
wages pain for pounding corns.
a blow with a pestle or a pestle-like weapon.

a kind of articulate worm of Chilopoda class, having an elongated, flattened body composed of from 15 to 173 segments, each with a pair of legs, and which rolls itself firmly up into a coil when touched.
= ಒನಕೆಬಂಡೆಹುಳು.
a folk song sung while pounding grains.
= ಒನಕೆಬಂಡೆಹುಳು.
to become one by joining with other things, people, countries, etc.
behaviour of a woman intended to excite admiration or love in men merely for the sake of vanity or mischief; flirtation; coquetry.
a girl or woman who tries to fascinate or allure men by her behaviour or affected manners.
a man unduly devoted to style, smartness, and fashion in dress and appearance; a dandy.
= ಒನಪುಗಾತಿ.
a garland of forest flowers.
to happen; to occur.
to cause to happen; to make (something) occur.
= ಒನಲು.

a utensil consisting of a surface having many small meshed or perforated openings enclosed in a frame, used to strain solids from liquids, to separate fine particles of loose matter from coarser ones, etc.; a sieve.
to make angry; to fill with rage; to enrage.
to become angry; to infuriate; to get enraged.
= ಒನಲಿಸು.
to expose (grain etc.) to the wind or to a current of air so that unwanted lighter particles of chaff etc. are separated or blown away; to clear of waste material in this way; to winnow.
to move or swing back and forth; to dangle; to shake (oneself).
to cause to move back and forth; to cause to vibrate; to shake.
to fascinate or charm by affected manners or behaviours.
ಒನೆದಾಡು onedāḍu to move back and forth; 2. to behave coquettishly; to flirt.
small stone or stone piece separated from grains by winnowing.
= ಒಪ್ಪ1.
that which is attached, given along with.
compliance in or approval of what is done or proposed by another; agreement as to action or opinion; consent; assent.
a person's name written by that person or a representation of this in a mark, stamp, etc.; a signature.
an acceptable statement, remark, opinion or view.
ಒಪ್ಪವಿಲ್ಲದ ಮಾತು, ತುಪ್ಪವಿಲ್ಲದ ಊಟ oppavillada mātu, tuppavillada ūṭa speech lacking logic or consistency leads to tedium.
the quality of being elegant; dignified or refined grace; attractive quality; elegance.
neatness in appearance, ways, etc.; orderliness; tidiness.
the state of being; condition.
the visual impression of something produced by reflection from a mirror; an image.
that which is used to enhance beauty or elegance; an ornament.
the act of burying a dead body.
ಒಪ್ಪಮಾಡು oppa māḍu to place (a dead body) in the earth, usu. in a ceremonial manner; to bury.
neatness; tidiness; orderliness.
to put or arrange in proper order; to make neat and tidy.
to put (a dead body) into the earth, a tomb, esp. in a ceremonial manner; to bury.
to keep in proper order.
to become tidy; to be arranged in a proper manner.
= ಒಪ್ಪಗೆಡಿಸು.
= ಒಪ್ಪಗುಂದು.
= ಒಪ್ಪಗುಂದು.

an agreement between two or more people to do something which is enforceable by law, either or not formally set forth in writing; contract.
a formal agreement between two or more nations, relating to peace, alliance, trade, etc.; a treaty.

ಒಪ್ಪಂದಕ್ಕೆ ಬರು oppandakke baru to come to an agreement; to concur on some issue; to enter into a contract or treaty; ಒಪ್ಪಂದ ಮಾಡಿಕೊ oppanda māḍiko to make an agreement; to enter into a contract or treaty.
beauty of the whole (as opp. to that of individual parts); harmony in arrangement, logical integration of parts in making a whole.
one who accepts esp. one who signs an agreement of a contract.

= ಒಪ್ಪಂಬಡೆ.
to become logically integrated, consistent and harmonised.
to be tidy; to be neatly arranged.
to add lustre to; to make (something) shine, elegant, attractive; to polish.
to put into or as into, a spell; to charm; to fascinate.
= ಒಪ್ಪಂಬಡೆ.
a man who maintains tidiness; he who is inclined to keep things in orderly manner or attaches importance to his manner, appearance, etc.
to polish, add lustre, cause (something) to be elegant or attractive.
a woman who pays much attention to her clothes and appearance.
she who pays much attention to neatness, tidiness, beatification.
a woman who spends money carefully and judiciously.
to offer; to present; to submit.
to lose beauty, natural shape or form.
(beauty, charm, elegance, attractiveness, form etc.) to be deteriorated or lost.
to spoil beauty, charm, elegance, attractiveness of something.

the action that gives the finished appearance; the act of beautifying.
to agree to; to give consent; to accept.
to receive favourably; to accept.
to set (something) right; to put or arrange in an orderly manner; to change from wrong to right; to remove errors from; to beautify.

in a small degree; to a slight extent; not much; a little.
one time; one time only; once.
any one of a series of moments at which the same or nearly the same thing recurs; repeated occasion; time.
an old monetary unit.
= ಒಪ್ಪವಿಡು.
= ಒಪ್ಪಿಸು.

= ಒಪ್ಪಿಸು.
a cover for the eyes (of a horse) to prevent diversion while drawing a cart.

(obs.) a single unit of weight pala.

to set (something) rightly; to put or arrange in an orderly manner; to beautify.
to be or become beautiful; to be charming.
to make shiny or beautiful; to polish; to burnish; to beautify.

to set right; to amend (an disorder, error, omission, etc.); to correct.
(fig.) to consign (dead body) to the grave; to bury.

a metal stick used by smiths to polish, embellish metal items.

to write one's name on, as in acknowledging authorship, authorising action, etc.; to attest or endorse with one's signature; to sign.
to make shiny or beautiful; to polish; to burnish; to beautify.
an agreement between two or more people to do something which is enforceable by law, either or not formally set forth in writing; contract.
a formal agreement between two or more nations, relating to peace, alliance, trade, etc.; a treaty.
service; attendance.
polite behaviour; politeness; civility; courteous treatment.
(obs.) a single unit of quantity hāne (esp. grains).
ಒಪ್ಪಾನೆ ಅಕ್ಕಿಗೆ ಇಪ್ಪಾನೆ ಅಕ್ಕಿ ನಾಯಿ ತಿಂದಿತು oppāne akkige ippāne nāyi tinditu to to lose a ship for a half-penny worth of tar.
the state or quality of (two or more things) being alike; similarity; likeness.
the only side (of a thing as building, etc.).
the roof of a building slanting towards one side only; a sloping roof; a pent-roof.

(a nursery term) a jewel.

consent; agreement; acceptance.
to be agreeable or agreed; to be acceptable or accepted.
a man who accepts; a person who signs an agreement; an acceptor.
a statement in writing giving one's consent to.
to get, receive another's consent, concurrence.
the quantity or volume that can be held in one's fist.
one's waist that is slender as can be encircled by one's palm with fingers stretched.
to consent; to concur; to agree to.
to respect; to treat with regard.
to make shiny or beautiful; to polish; to burnish; to beautify.
permission; approval; assent; consent.
one's name, a mark representing it, written, marked by that person as in acknowledging authorship, authorising action, etc.; signature.
to fit in, be as an ornament; to be present to increase the beauty, grace, importance of an assembly, occasion, etc.
to keep at a optimum level; to make less hard; to make (something) bearable.

to give a report to; to inform; to brief.
to convince; to make (another) agree to; to persuade to agree to; to bring (someone) around.

to give assent; to agree to.

to get or gain beauty.
consent; agreement; concurrence; assent.
betel leaves together with areca nut given to another as a token of acceptance or agreement.

the quality of shining, glittering; attractiveness.

a very small distance or dimension.

once a day (only) (as taking foods etc.).

ಒಪ್ಪೊತ್ತು ಮಾಡು oppottu māḍu to take food once a day only (on a particular day of every week); ಒಪ್ಪೊತ್ತು ಉಂಡವ ಯೋಗಿ, ಎರಡು ಹೊತ್ತು ಉಂಡವ ಭೋಗಿ, ಮೂರುಹೊತ್ತು ಉಂಡವ ರೋಗಿ, ನಾಲ್ಕು ಹೊತ್ತು ಉಂಡವನ್ನು ಎತ್ತುಕೊಂಡು ಹೋಗಿ oppottu undava yōgi, eraḍu hottu uṇḍava bhōgi, mūruhottu uṇḍava rōgi, nālku hottu undavannu hottukontu hōgi over indulgence in food makes life short; surfeits slay more than swords.
a list of corrected errors attached to a book etc.; a corrigendum; errata.
one only; one and no more; individual; single.

a single man; ಒಬ್ಬರಿಗೊಬ್ಬರು obbarigobbaru mutually; reciprocally; ಒಬ್ಬರಿಗೊಬ್ಬರು ಆಗು obbarigobbaru āgu to help, assist mutually; ಒಬ್ಬಾನೊಬ್ಬ obbanobba any (indefinite) man; ಒಬ್ಬೊಬ್ಬರು obbobbaru one after the other; in turn; 2. each one (separately); ಒಬ್ಬೊಬ್ಬರು obbobbaru (pl.) a man here and a man there; a few people; ಒಬ್ಬನಿಗಿಂತ ಇಬ್ಬರು ಲೇಸು obbaniginta ibbaru lēsu combined effort or cooperative action gives more than the total of individual efforts; four eyes see more than two; ಸಾವಿರಕ್ಕೆ/ಲಕ್ಷಕ್ಕೆ/ಕೋಟಿಗೆ ಒಬ್ಬ sāvirakke/lakṣakke/kōṭige obba someone that is very special or very good in some way.

= ಒಬ್ಬೊಂಟಿಗ.
a kind of sweet cake.
a measure of quantity equal to two seers.
this much quantity (of grain, corn, milk, etc.).
the concentrated, focussed mind.

a place; a particular area or locality.

the act, process or fact of (several persons) being together.
to keep, put or store at a place.
to come together or assemble at a place.

to come together or assemble at a place; to accumulate in great mass.

a single group; unity.

the condition or an instance of being agreeable completely or united in opinion; unanimity of opinion, purpose etc.

an old unit of measure of capacity.
a mind focussed on a single subject.
the quality of being sincere in observing religious vows.
a vow undertaken, that one would see another or others similar to oneself.
to have concentrated mind; to focus the mind on a single object only.
solage, a single unit of measure of capacity, now obsolete.
a man with a single-mind , focussed mind.
the state of the mind that is concentrating on a single subject.
an old unit of measure of quantity.
the distance from the tip of the middle finger of one hand to that of another hand when stretched apart.
the one side of any thing.
to turn, tilt toward one-side.
a single-storied house.
on one occasion or for one time only; once.
to join two or more things together.
to go or come after another; to follow.
to act in accordance with; to imitate.
to agree to; to accept; to consent.
the state of being unified in another; a becoming one; a union of actions or purposes.
the state of being alone; loneliness.
the state or quality of being excellent; excellence.
consent; concurrence; agreement.

a small bite or portion of food (that can be chewed at a time).
the quality or state of being unified; unity; singleness.

one time, occasion only; once.
ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆ ommindomme suddenly; all of a sudden; ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆಗೆ ommindommege = ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆ; ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆಲೆ ommindommele = ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆ; ಒಮ್ಮೆಗೆ ommege = ಒಮ್ಮಿಂದೊಮ್ಮೆ; 2) once only; one time only.
(all) at once; (several things or everything happening) simultaneously.
a single body.
the state of being one or united; oneness; singleness.

ಒರಳಲ್ಲಿ ಕೂತರೆ ಒನಕೆಯ ಪೆಟ್ಟು ತಪ್ಪೀತೆ? oraḷalli kūtare onake peṭṭu tappīte one cannot protect himself from burning by jumping into the fire; gather thistles and expect prickles; ಒರಳಲ್ಲಿ ಹರಳು ಹುರಿದರೆ ಅರಳು ಆದೀತೆ? orḷalli haraḷu huridare araḷu ādīte? action sans wisdom can never bring the desired result; ಒರಳು ಹೋಗಿ ಮದ್ದಳೆ ಸಂಗಡ ಹೇಳಿದ ಹಾಗೆ oraḷu hōgi maddaḷe saŋgaḍa hēḷida hāge a simile used to describe a situation of one agonised person going to another similarly agonised person, for sympathy.

that which is withered, dried, sapless.
